</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENCamera''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>// set exact yaw, pitch, and roll
_y = 45; _p = -80; _r = 0;
[[get3DENCamera]] [[setVectorDirAndUp]] [
	[ [[sin]] _y * [[cos]] _p,[[cos]] _y * [[cos]] _p,[[sin]] _p],
	[ [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[sin]] _r,-[[sin]] _p,[[cos]] _r * [[cos]] _p],-_y] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_rotateVector2D]]
];
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>//Look at player
_a = [[positionCameraToWorld]] [0,0,0] [[vectorFromTo]] ([[getPosATL]] [[player]]);
_y = [[asin]](_a [[select]] 0);
_b = [_a,_y] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_rotateVector2D]];
_z = _b [[select]] 2;
_p = [[asin]](_z / [[sqrt]]((_b [[select]] 1)^2 + _z^2));
get3DENCamera [[setVectorDirAndUp]] [
	_a,
	[ [0,-[[sin]] _p,[[cos]] _p],-_y] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_rotateVector2D]]
];
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
